subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni prefers a quick-paced game. But if the Knicks are not fit to play run-and-gun — and the current lineup is not — D’Antoni will find another way.
snippet: Mike D’Antoni prefers a quick-paced game. But if the Knicks are not fit to play run-and-gun — and the current lineup is not — D’Antoni will find another way.
